action.content:
You are playing a text adventure game. I will describe what you can perceive in the game. You write the single action you want to take in the game starting with >. Write your plan for your next actions on the line below your action, starting with "Next actions:".
For example:
> open cupboard
Next actions: take orange, eat orange

You can have up to two objects in your inventory at the same time.

Your goal for this game is: Put the pillow in the freezer, the broom on the bed and the plate on the table.

Once you have achieved your goal, write "> done" to end the game.

You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a living room, a broom closet and a kitchen here.

> go to kitchen
Next actions: look around kitchen

You are in a kitchen now. There is a refrigerator and a table here. There is a plate on the table. There are passages to a hallway and a freezer room here.
Next actions: look around freezer room
> go to freezer room
Next actions: look around freezer room

You are in a freezer room now. There is a freezer here. There are passages to a kitchen here.
Next actions: go to hallway
> go to hallway
Next actions: go to broom closet
